overview.title: Project Overview
description: Viral Rush is a survival action game where players control a cellular warrior navigating through infected zones to eliminate hostile viruses. The objective is to cleanse each area, gather biological resources, and strengthen the cell to survive increasingly dangerous environments.

The game focuses on fast-paced combat, strategic movement, and progressive expansion. By defeating enemies and collecting resources, players unlock upgrades and new lands, gradually reclaiming the cellular world from viral threats.

content.label: Core Gameplay
item: Player controls a cellular warrior in a hostile environment.
Viruses spawn and patrol across different regions of the map.
Defeating viruses drops resources used to upgrade strength.
Clearing enemies to level up and unlock futher areas.

content.label: Combat System
item: Approach the target to attack, and continue attacking until the target's health is depleted. Once you stop attacking, the target will recover very quickly.
Elite viruses introduce special abilities and hazards.
Player health management is critical for survival.
Combat intensity increases as new areas unlock.

content.label: Resource & Upgrade System
item: Resources are collected from defeated viruses and map spots.
Resources are used to upgrade attack, defense, and abilities.
Upgrades provide permanent progression.
Some upgrades unlock new mechanics or skills.
Strategic upgrade choices affect playstyle.

content.label: Minion Mechanisms
item: Hunter Cell: Helps you defeat small viruses for bonus resources and experiences.
Transport Cell: Helps you transport resources from character into homebase.

content.label: Logic Flow
item: Cellular warrior spawned in home area
Explore the map and engage nearby viruses
Defeat enemies and collect resources
Upgrade abilities and stats
Clear the zone and unlock new land
Repeat with stronger enemies and higher stakes

content.label: World & Progression
item: Map is divided into multiple infection zones.
Each zone introduces new virus types.
Environmental hazards increase difficulty.
Progression is tied to land expansion.
Late-game areas demand optimized builds.

content.label: Visual & Feedback Design
item: Stylized cellular environments with strong color contrast.
Clear visual distinction between player and virus entities.
Responsive hit effects and damage feedback.
Smooth upgrade animations to reinforce progression.
Dynamic visual changes as areas are purified.
